metadata.human_readable: Corpus collection. Language production priors on randomized batches of the data.

pages:
Welcome! In this experiment, you will describe some pictures of objects.



This experiment should take a total of 40 minutes, including the time it takes to read these instructions. You will receive $10 for completing this study (approx. $15/hr).



When you are finished, the study will be automatically submitted to be reviewed for approval. You can only perform this study one time. We take your compensation and time seriously! Please message us if you run into any problems while completing this study, or if it takes much more time than expected.



Note: we recommend using Chrome, and putting your browser in full screen. This study has not been tested in other browsers.

Imagine you are an architect. Your boss has created some models for a new series of structures! They won't allow the models to leave the boardroom, but have asked you to write instructions describing each model so that anyone could recreate them from scratch. Your goal is to describe exactly what needs to be placed where, step by step, to accurately recreate each model.


Before you begin, we'll give you a chance to practice writing clear instructions using our special interface. You can add instructions steps by clicking the add instruction steps button or by hitting the return key, as well as remove instruction steps if you accidentally add too many.


When you are done with your instructions, click SUBMIT INSTRUCTIONS to move onto the next structure. Your instructions do not need to be perfect, but please try your best! Press NEXT to see what the interface will look like.

experiment_trial_parameters.label_prompt: How would you create this image?

pages:
Great! To give you an idea of what these structures look like, we'll show you 25 examples that are representative of the kinds of structures the company has made in the past.


Please take a moment to inspect each structure and imagine what instructions you would give to recreate it exactly. When you are ready to proceed to the next structure, either click CONTINUE or hit the RIGHT ARROW key.

experiment_trial_parameters.label_prompt: Example structures. Press the right arrow to reveal the image under the green square.

pages:
Now that you have a better idea of what these structures look like in general, we'll show you the actual 25 structures that you will be providing instructions for.


Please inspect each one carefully to familiarize yourself with the important details that distinguish each structure from the others!


Once you click NEXT, you won’t be able to see all of the images at once. However, we will show you a few of the images that are next in line so you know what’s coming up, and how many you have left.


Click NEXT to begin!

experiment_trial_parameters.label_prompt: When you're ready, click the continue button or the right arrow to begin labeling
